remarks: The right angle property is independent of the choice of point on one side.  Theorem 8.3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 58.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Aug-2019.)
statement:
israg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
israg.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
israg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
israg.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
israg.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
israg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
israg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
israg.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
israg.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
ragcol.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
ragcol.1 $e |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
ragcol.2 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
ragcol.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( B L D ) \/ B = D ) ) $.
ragcol $p |- ( ph -> <" D B C "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
